Sentencas: and Fe dopants with the amount of 20 and 40 mol% on the properties of La0.84Sr0.16MnO3 were investigated.
Titulo: Effects of Co and Fe addition on the properties of lanthanum strontium manganite

Sentencas: All compositions were prepared by conventional mixed oxide process and sintered at 1450 degreesC.
Titulo: Effects of Co and Fe addition on the properties of lanthanum strontium manganite

Sentencas: The structure of undoped and Co-doped compositions was found to be monoclinic.
Titulo: Effects of Co and Fe addition on the properties of lanthanum strontium manganite

Sentencas: In addition, the second phase was observed in these sintered compositions.
Titulo: Effects of Co and Fe addition on the properties of lanthanum strontium manganite

Sentencas: The conductivity of doped materials decreased as compared to that of La0.84Sr0.16MnO3.
Titulo: Effects of Co and Fe addition on the properties of lanthanum strontium manganite

Sentencas: The SEM microstructure showed the decrease of grain size as Co content increased.
Titulo: Effects of Co and Fe addition on the properties of lanthanum strontium manganite

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) tended to increase as Co content increased.
Titulo: Effects of Co and Fe addition on the properties of lanthanum strontium manganite

Sentencas: In contrast, the monoclinic and orthorhombic structures were found in 20 and 40 mol% Fe-doped La0.84Sr0.16MnO3.
Titulo: Effects of Co and Fe addition on the properties of lanthanum strontium manganite

Sentencas: The arnount of second phase in sintered composition depends on the amount of Fe content.
Titulo: Effects of Co and Fe addition on the properties of lanthanum strontium manganite

Sentencas: The conductivity at 1000 degreesC decreased, but the grain size increased as Fe content increased.
Titulo: Effects of Co and Fe addition on the properties of lanthanum strontium manganite

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficient slightly changed with Fe addition.
Titulo: Effects of Co and Fe addition on the properties of lanthanum strontium manganite
